thread.title: Re: DERP: Stephen King tweets dig at ‘excruciatingly dumb’ Trump, makes YUGE spelling error
thread.title_full: Re: DERP: Stephen King tweets dig at ‘excruciatingly dumb’ Trump, makes YUGE spelling error

author: Gloves M. Donahue
title: Re: DERP: Stephen King tweets dig at ‘excruciatingly dumb’ Trump, makes YUGE spelling error
text:
Dude, really? Stephen King thinks Anthony Weiner is ‘bright but troubled’; uses him to trash Trump Posted at 8:19 am on February 5, 2017 by Sam J. 
Stephen King watched a documentary on Anthony Weiner that he found fascinating. 
Not disturbing. Fascinating. 
Right? Yikes. 
Late Saturday night, King tweeted this out about the disgraced politician: WEINER: Fascinating doc about a bright but troubled man. The underlying question is why the shit stuck to him…but not to Trump. 
— Stephen King (@StephenKing) February 5, 2017 
Maybe King missed it, but Weiner is a DEVIANT, not just a troubled man. Repeat offender and such? 
Of course Weiner is a Democrat so that obviously gives him a pass with King, but wow. . @StephenKing A bright but troubled man accused of distributing child pornography. Have another drink. 
— Gay Guevara (@DefendWallSt) February 5, 2017 Trending
